recipes.name: Magic Cake
recipes.summary: One simple thin batter, bake it and voila! You end up with a 3 layer cake, with a delicious custardy layer in the center. It really is magical.

recipes.name: Florida Omlette
recipes.summary: In cuisine, an omelette or omelet is a dish made from beaten eggs fried with butter or oil in a frying pan.
